channel.title: Deforestation on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS
channel.description: Recent content in Deforestation on QField - Efficient field work built for QGIS

item.title: QField for EUDR (EU Deforestation Regulation) Data Collection
item.description:
What you can do

  • Plot mapping and evidence capture
  • Risk assessment and verification
  • Export to standard formats for reporting

Integrated with QGIS and QFieldCloud

Prepare data models in QGIS and collaborate securely with QFieldCloud.
